hero.description: Want to create your QR menu without pain? With FoodMate, adding new menu is a breeze.

features.title: Features
features.description: FoodMate has several awesome features that makes it perfect to take your restaurant's menu to the next level

featureList.firstFeatureDescription: The generated menu page has been optimized for search engines.
featureList.thirdFeatureDescription: Free forever. No trials, feature limitations, or menu volume restrictions.
featureList.fourthFeatureDescription: FoodMate provides an intuitive interface to easily manage your restaurants.
featureList.fifthFeatureDescription: Generate a QR code, print and share it by simply placing it on your restaurant tables.
featureList.sixthFeatureDescription: Allow users to switch between a visually pleasing dark theme and a light theme in the app

homePage.title: FoodMate - Digital menu generator
